researchProjectDef.label: Millenium Line Furniture
researchProjectDef.description: One of your colonists found an old data-stick full of ancient E-Magazines. Among the salvageable data is a RIMkea Magazine, issue #4120. It introduced the "futuristic" RIMkea Millenium Line, and now you can build it too!
